website_summaries.verdict: For frequent GoPro users, the Mota Wireless Charger is well worth the investment for keeping your camera powered up wherever you are.
pros: The Mota Wireless Charger for GoPro charges a Hero3 or Hero4 camera in its housing
Has a slot for charging a second battery and you can use its 7,500mAh battery to charge another device via USB
cons: charging still takes a couple hours, not minutes, to go from completely empty to fully charged.
Doesn't work wirelessly with GoPro Hero, Hero+ LCD or Hero4 Session

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I was searching for a all in one solution for charging my GoPro on the road. I wanted to be able to easily charge my GoPro, it’s spare battery, and my iPhone with one simple solution. That’s exactly what I got. The really neat thing is you can charge your GoPro wirelessly. They really makes it very convenient and simple to do. I usually just set the camera down and it’s fully charged within a couple hours. While it does have a bit of a station footprint, the look is very sleek and ergonomically designed. I love my GoPro and this charger really pulls everything together nicely. I really think GoPro should provide this type of solution with the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Dealguy

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome!! Forget about all of the cords that ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome!! Forget about all of the cords that are too short, tripping over cords, tangled cords and fraying cords (ie apple). Just set down your gopro on this wireless charger and it is good to go. This thing charges quickly and has a really cool, sleek look. It is a must have accessory for anyone serious about their gopro camera. Worth every penny, I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Product
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product, the charging piece fits into the housing perfectly and still makes the GoPro easy to remove. It's perfect that you can also charge a cell phone or any other device through the USB charger, and the battery life is impressive. If outdoors, you can easily charge your GoPro without having to remove it from the casing and possibly damaging it. The device is nice and snug, and can easily fit into a small bag without taking up much room. The second battery slot is extremely useful to always have a full battery on you. Overall, great product.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: i love its sleek and compact design
customer_reviews.text: This charger is just was I was looking for. I am able to charge both my GoPro and spare battery all at once while on the go. i love its sleek and compact design. It has convenient LED indicators to let you know how my battery life is remaining. My only complaint would be that I am unable to charge my GoPro while my waterproof case in on it. I have the GoPro 3 and am able to charge it with all my other cases except for the waterproof one. But other than that, I love this product and have had no problems with it! I definitely would recommend this product.

product_meta.title: MOTA Wireless Charger for GoPro
product_meta.description:
MOTA Wireless Charger for GoPro keeps your camera running wherever you go. Shoot longer! Go for that prize shot, capture at 4K, extend your use of HERO accessories like GoPro's LCD Touch BacPac and Wi-Fi—do more with your GoPro than ever before!

MOTA Wireless Charger for GoPro frees you to capture more of life’s most precious moments. Easy to use, small and light enough for a kit bag or camera vest, its rugged water resistant construction means you can take it anywhere you go. It even charges a spare GoPro battery at the same time as the camera. A built-in USB port lets you recharge other USB devices like a smartphone.
feature_bullets: Freedom of Security – Wireless Charger allows you to charge while keeping your GoPro safe in its housing. Additional battery slot on side and USB ports allow SIMULTANEOUS charging of all electronics. Protect your GoPro as it records breathtaking experiences

Housing snaps securely into position for wireless receiver to charge on the go. Charge your extra GoPro 3, 3+ and 4 batteries for longer trips. Side ports allow charging of smartphones or tablets. 5400 mAh Lithium Battery can sustain all devices

Your GoPro is capable of capturing the most insane moments in your adventures. It’s as vulnerable to the elements as you are, so protect it like you should. With this charger never remove it from the housing again, you shouldn’t have to while you’re out and about

Our charger actually lets you still record while charging, so you can use it for time lapse shots, or when you need last minute juice to catch that sunset on your hike. It’ll charge your GoPro incredibly quick, sit down for a snack and water and you’ll be ready to go

MOTA Customer Care - All MOTA products come with our 5-star dedicated personal assistance. Please let us know if you have any issues with shipments or the products right away, we'll take care of you! Follow ups within hours, satisfaction guaranteed
